緀字的基本解释

緀
qī
古同“萋”，文彩交错：“緀兮斐兮，成是贝锦。”
缝衣的俗称。

緀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qī］
［《廣韻》七稽切，平齊，清。］
［《廣韻》千禮切，上薺，清。］
亦作“紪1”。
花纹错杂貌。

緀字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　緀； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页928第18
【廣韻】七稽切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】千西切，?音妻。【說文】帛文貌。詩曰：緀兮斐兮，成是貝錦。○按《詩》今本作萋。《廣韻》緀斐，文章相錯貌。　又【廣韻】千禮切【集韻】此禮切，?音泚。義同。

緀字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
緀字的起名意思

暂无。

緀
Basic explanation of words
緀
qī
In ancient times, the same "萋", text and color are intertwined: "Simple and beautiful, it is a shell brocade."
Common name for sewing.
緀
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qī］
["Guangyun" seven cuts, level, and clear. ]
["Guangyun" Thousands of courtesy cuts, upper water chestnut, Qing. ]
Also known as "紪1".
The pattern is intricate and miscellaneous.
緀
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　緀; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 928 18
[Guang Yun] Qi Ji cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Qianxi Qi,? Yin wife. [Speaking text] The appearance of silk text. The poem said: 緀 Xi Fei Xi, Cheng is Bei Jin. ○According to the present edition of "Poetry", it is written as 萋. In "Guang Yun", the article has a wrong appearance.　[Guangyun] Qianliqie [Jiyun] This ceremonial cut,? Sound. The same meaning.
緀

緀
Name meaning
Nothing.
qī, cǐ
прил. * узорчатый, изящно орнаментированный (о шёлковой ткани)
